item.title: Scoreboard for trisidiax v2 (317)
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

hey how do i fix scoreboard if just my name shows up into it?
im using this code: public void highscores() { getPA().sendFrame126(""+ Config.SERVER_NAME +" Top 10 Players", 6399); for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { if(ranks[i] > 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+1)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6402+i); } } getPA().showInterface(6308); flushOutStream(); resetRanks(); }

Read full topic
